You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesF F] > &frasl;

== Value ==

`&frasl;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2044/index.htm U+02044].
